column4: Hi... I was trying to reinstall Ubuntu earlier but it kept freezing while installing updates (via apt-get upgrade). No errors, it just stopped, on several files. After a forced restart Ubuntu wouldnt boot. Any ideas?
wot erreor msg while rebooting do u get?
- I could login, then the system just stopped doing anything. I'm trying to install Windows now to use scandisk.
- I've put Windows on for now so I can check the HDD and RAM (Toshiba utility's are Win only)
